briefdescription.para: Defines the base model interface and related functions for inflationary cosmology.

detaileddescription.para: This header file contains the declaration of the model class, which encapsulates the defining features of an inflationary model, including the flow tensors (u1, u2, u3) and the action-related tensors (A, B, C). It also provides methods for calculating cosmological parameters like the Hubble rate (H), slow-roll parameters (epsilon, eta), and gauge transformation tensors (N1, N2).
The class interacts with the potential class to retrieve potential values and their derivatives.
